favourite.article: Lord we love You! You took care of our highest need--LIFE! Life abundantly given to us. Our need is not this or that. Save us from the big deceit. Our primary need is life. All our problems come from a shortage of life. Thank You that Your life is mingled with ours! Amen!
I love this song because it reminds me of the assurance and joy of my salvation, a life that will never leave me! Hallelujah!!!!
